meta.description: Language labels for the Dynamic Content Elements extension in the FRONTEND

languageKey.label: General
Available variables
Famous viewhelper
DCE viewhelper
Opens the settings of the DCE which this DCE instance based on, in a popup
*Created or updated by frontend*
If a content element based on DCE, has been created in frontend context, it is not possible to render this preview texts, because in frontend extbase resources are not always available. (eID: %s)
*The DCE base has been updated*
Click here to update the preview texts, or save the content element manually.
Allgemein
Verfügbare Variablen
Meist verwendete Viewhelper
DCE Viewhelper
Öffnet die Einstellungen des DCE, auf welches diese DCE-Instanz basiert in einem Popup.
